channel.title: Will someone help me Portforward my Server
channel.description:
Hello everyone i am making a Server but i have a Sky router so please can someone help me
Skype Name : ii360Modders MSN : Morgan.sidle@hotmail.co.uk
If you can help me Contact me i also have teamviewer

item.title: Will someone help me Portforward my Server
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.source: Will someone help me Portforward my Server

item.title: Will someone help me Portforward my Server
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

[quote=“NumberEleven, post:3, topic:398784”][quote author=Tobbescape link=topic=495921.msg3625621#msg3625621 date=1307819271]
no
[/quote]

Just ignore that faggot^

Run. CMD, ip config

From there get your default gateway.

Then put your default gateway into your url.

Then tell me whether or not under the tabs of your router has it got something like virtual servers?[/quote]
Either virtual servers or NAT^_^

Read full topic
item.source: Will someone help me Portforward my Server

item.title: Will someone help me Portforward my Server
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.description:
@NumberEleven wrote:

Tobbescape:

no

Just ignore that faggot^

Run. CMD, ip config

From there get your default gateway.

Then put your default gateway into your url.

Then tell me whether or not under the tabs of your router has it got something like virtual servers?
